Events that occurred on 17 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 10.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mrs. A. Mountfield.
1965 - Joan O. Falconer writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to N.J. Kyle.
1977 - Adam Fox, Inkling, dies.
1982 - Mr. Bliss is published in the US.
1983 - Actor Ryan Gage is born.
2001 - Tolkien collector Richard E. Blackwelder dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring pass the Silverlode and reach the Naith and Cerin Amroth.
The Orcs following them are killed or flee to the Misty Mountains.
The Fellowship comes to Caras Galadhon in the evening.
